## OptimisticHttpRequest interface

Describes an object used to make optimistic http requests.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OptimisticHttpRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiUrl](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.apiurl.md) | string | The url suffix of the api endpoint. Gets appended to base url provided with [BASE\_API\_URL](./optimistic-http.base_api_url.md) |
|  [body](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.body.md) | {} \| [FormDataEntry](./optimistic-http.formdataentry.md)<!-- -->\[\] \| null \| undefined | The body of the http request |
|  [cancelMessage?](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.cancelmessage.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom cancel message in case the request gets canceled. |
|  [method](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.method.md) | "POST" \| "PUT" \| "DELETE" | The http method of the request |
